feature.description: log prob score of the hypothesis

CMU word penalty
maximum size of the bi-phrases for the target sentence, in terms of number of words
CMU: proportion of unknown words
relative frequency in the nbest list
averaged target word statistics: score-weighted relative frequency of the word in the n-best list
averaged target word statistics: relative frequency of the word in the n-best list occurring in the same position as the target word
ratio of log prob (base model score) of the current hypothesis to the sum of the log prob score of all hypothesis
ratio of log prob (base model score) of the current hypothesis to the sum of the log prob score of all hypothesis
average size of hypotheses in the n-best list
n-best list density (vocabulary size / average sentence length)
fertility of the words in the source sentence compared to the n-best list in terms of words (vocabulary size / source sentence length)
edit distance of the current hypothesis to the center hypothesis
percentage of other hypothesis with and edit distance to the centre < (current hypothesis edit distance to the centre * 0.5)
percentage of other hypothesis with and edit distance to the centre < (current hypothesis edit distance to the centre * 0.35)
